metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13453 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Zipios before 0.1.7 does not properly handle certain malformed zip archives and can go into an infinite loop, causing a denial of service. This is related to zipheadio.h:readUint32() and zipfile.cpp:Zipfile::Zipfile(). Mike Salvatore discovered that Zipios mishandled certain malformed ZIP files. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or consume system resources.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzipios++0c2a - 0.1.5.9+cvs.2007.04.28-5.1ubuntu0.14.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zipios++ package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.1.5.9+cvs.2007.04.28-5.1ubuntu0.14.04.1~esm1').
